text: Larry Douglas Mavety (May 29, 1942 â€“ December 4, 2020) was a Canadian professional ice hockey player, coach and executive in the Ontario Hockey League (OHL). He played and coached for the Belleville Bulls and the Kingston Frontenacs. Mavety was born in Woodstock, Ontario. His coaching career lasted from 1981 to 2003. Mavety died on December 4, 2020 in Kingston, Ontario at the age of 78.Long time Bulls coach-GM Larry Mavety passes away ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey coaches Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario
title: Larry Mavety
